members.signatureBeforeChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
diff: +	* Feature in Cocoa.  Attempting to create an NSComboBox with a
+	* height > 27 spews a very long warning message to stdout and
+	* often draws the combo incorrectly.  The workaround is to limit
+	* the returned height of editable Combos to the height that is
+	* required to display their text, even if a larger hHint is specified.
+		if ((style & SWT.READ_ONLY) != 0 || hHint < height) height = hHint;

members.signatureBeforeChange: TableItem _getItem (int index, boolean create, int count)
members.signatureAfterChange: TableItem _getItem (int index, boolean create, int count)
